thread.section_title: iTailor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iTailor | itailor.com
thread.title: neil whitehead

author: neil whitehead
title: neil whitehead
text:
Excellent website for choosing options. If anything special needed just drop them an email & they will respond in quick time.
I ordered an overcoat which arrived quicker than I expected, perfectly packed in its own drawstring duffle bag & included a suit bag for storage. I wanted an extra button hole in the lapel. An email sorted that out no problem.
Will definitely be ordering again.
